strings.FAMILY_PARENT: <style=cWorldEvent>[WARNING] A familial bond is being interrupted..</style>
strings.FAMILY_ROBOBALL: <style=cWorldEvent>[WARNING] You hear the whirring of wings and machinery..</style>
strings.FAMILY_PESTS: <style=cWorldEvent>[WARNING] You have invaded rampant breeding grounds..</style>
strings.RULE_PRISMATIC_NEW_DESC:
The Prismatic Trial will not end on it's own.
Bosses will start being elite on Stage 4
strings.RULE_PRISMATIC_OLD_DESC:
The Prismatic Trial will end after beating Stage 2.
Bosses will be elite on Stage 2
